mapper.select: SELECT UV.SBJCT_NO, UV.SBJCT_NM, UV.KORN_FLNM, UV.CRCLM_NM FROM USER_APPL_VIEW as UV WHERE UV.APPL_NO = #{appl_no } ORDER BY SBJCT_NO ASC

SELECT es.SBJCT_NM as 'SBJCT_NM', IFNULL(om.APPL_NO, lmm.APPL_NO) as 'APPL_NO', lti.LECT_YMD AS 'LECT_YMD', lti.SBJCT_MTHD_CD AS 'SBJCT_MTHD_CD', IFNULL(oli.ON_LECT_NM, 'ZOOM 수업') AS 'ON_LECT_NM', IFNULL(oli.ON_LECT_SN, lmi.MEET_ID) AS 'ON_LECT_SN', IFNULL(oli.ON_LECT_URL, lmi.JOIN_URL) AS 'LECT_URL', IFNULL(om.LECT_PRGRS_RT, 0) AS 'LECT_PRGRS_RT', IFNULL(lmm.ATTEND_STATUS, '결석') AS 'ATTENDANCE', fi.FILE_SN as 'FILE_SN', GROUP_CONCAT(fi.FILE_SN_SEQ ORDER BY fi.FILE_SN_SEQ SEPARATOR ',') AS 'FILE_SN_SEQ', GROUP_CONCAT(fi.PHYS_FILE_NM ORDER BY fi.PHYS_FILE_NM SEPARATOR ',') AS 'PHYS_FILE_NM', GROUP_CONCAT(fi.FILE_EXTN_NM ORDER BY fi.FILE_EXTN_NM SEPARATOR ',') AS 'FILE_EXTN_NM', GROUP_CONCAT(fi.FILE_PATH_NM ORDER BY fi.FILE_PATH_NM SEPARATOR ',') AS 'FILE_PATH_NM', GROUP_CONCAT(fi.FILE_SZ ORDER BY fi.FILE_SZ SEPARATOR ',') AS 'FILE_SZ' FROM LECT_TM_INFO lti LEFT JOIN ON_LECT_INFO oli ON lti.LECT_YMD = oli.LECT_YMD LEFT JOIN LECT_MEET_INFO lmi ON lti.LECT_YMD = lmi.LECT_YMD LEFT JOIN ON_LECT_MAG om ON lti.SBJCT_NO = om.SBJCT_NO AND lti.LECT_YMD = om.LECT_YMD AND om.APPL_NO = #{appl_no} LEFT JOIN LECT_MEET_MAG lmm ON lti.LECT_YMD = lmm.LECT_YMD AND lmm.APPL_NO = #{appl_no} LEFT JOIN ESTBL_SBJCT es ON es.SBJCT_NO = #{sbjct_no} LEFT JOIN FILE_INFO fi ON fi.FILE_SN = oli.LECT_FILE_SN WHERE lti.SBJCT_NO = #{sbjct_no} GROUP BY lti.LECT_YMD ORDER BY lti.LECT_YMD ASC

SELECT olm.APPL_NO, oli.ON_LECT_SN, oli.ON_LECT_URL, olm.LAST_PLAY_TM, olm.LECT_MAX_TM, olm.SBJCT_NO, olm.LECT_PRGRS_RT FROM ON_LECT_MAG olm JOIN ON_LECT_INFO oli ON olm.ON_LECT_SN = oli.ON_LECT_SN AND olm.APPL_NO = #{appl_no } WHERE oli.ON_LECT_SN = #{on_lect_sn }
SELECT LAST_PLAY_TM FROM ON_LECT_MAG WHERE ON_LECT_SN = #{on_lect_sn } AND APPL_NO = #{appl_no }

SELECT olm.APPL_NO as 'appl_no', lti.CRCLM_CD as 'crclm_cd', lti.CRCLM_CYCL as 'crclm_cycl', lti.LECT_YMD as 'lect_ymd', lti.SBJCT_NO as 'sbjct_no', lti.SBJCT_MTHD_CD as 'sbjct_mthd_cd' FROM ON_LECT_MAG olm LEFT JOIN LECT_TM_INFO lti ON olm.LECT_YMD = lti.LECT_YMD WHERE olm.APPL_NO = #{appl_no } AND olm.SBJCT_NO = #{sbjct_no } AND olm.ON_LECT_SN = #{on_lect_sn } AND olm.LECT_PRGRS_RT >= 90;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO APPL_ATND SET APPL_NO = #{appl_no }, SBJCT_NO = #{sbjct_no }, LECT_YMD = #{lect_ymd }, CRCLM_CYCL = #{crclm_cycl }, CRCLM_CD = #{crclm_cd }, SBJCT_MTHD_CD = #{sbjct_mthd_cd }, ATND_CD = 1
